casebody.data:
CARL AND EILBER
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 432P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 17, 2008. Donald H. Beskind, J. Martin Futrell, Raleigh, for Carl and Eilber. David Dreifus, for MedAmerica. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 665 S.E.2d 787 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of September 2008."
